official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the  Social Security Act to remove the requirement that prior hospitalization is necessary before extended care facility benefits are available under the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the requirement that prior hospitalization is necessary before extended care facility benefits are available under the Medicare program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the  Social Security Act to remove the requirement that prior hospitalization is necessary before extended care facility benefits are available under the medicare program.
